mapper.select: /* CategoryProduct.selectCategoryProductInfo */ SELECT PRD_CTG_IDX , (SELECT PRD_CTG_NM FROM T_PRD_CTG WHERE PRD_CTG_IDX = A.PRD_CTG_TOP_IDX) PRD_CTG_TOP_NM , (SELECT PRD_CTG_NM FROM T_PRD_CTG WHERE PRD_CTG_TOP_IDX != -1 AND PRD_CTG_IDX = A.PRD_CTG_UP_IDX) PRD_CTG_UP_NM , SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRD_CTG_NM, '>'),2) AS PRD_CTG_LVL_NM , PRD_CTG_NM , PRD_CTG_LEVEL , PRD_CTG_UP_IDX , PRD_CTG_TOP_IDX , PRD_CTG_SORT , PRD_CTG_USE_YN , PRD_CTG_REG_DT , PRD_CTG_REG_IP , PRD_CTG_REG_ID , PRD_CTG_UPD_DT , PRD_CTG_UPD_IP , PRD_CTG_UPD_ID , (SELECT COUNT(PRD_CTG_IDX) FROM T_PRD_CTG WHERE PRD_CTG_UP_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX} AND PRD_CTG_DEL_YN != 'Y') AS CHILD_CNT , PRD_CTG_ENV , PRD_CTG_DSP_YN FROM T_PRD_CTG A WHERE PRD_CTG_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX} AND PRD_CTG_DEL_YN != 'Y' START WITH PRD_CTG_UP_IDX = -1 CONNECT BY PRIOR PRD_CTG_IDX = PRD_CTG_UP_IDX
mapper.update: /* CategoryProduct.updateCategoryProduct */ UPDATE T_PRD_CTG SET PRD_CTG_NM = #{PRD_CTG_NM}, PRD_CTG_USE_YN = #{PRD_CTG_USE_YN}, PRD_CTG_UPD_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), PRD_CTG_UPD_IP = #{PRD_CTG_UPD_IP}, PRD_CTG_UPD_ID = #{PRD_CTG_UPD_ID}, PRD_CTG_DSP_YN = #{PRD_CTG_DSP_YN} WHERE PRD_CTG_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX}

/* CategoryProduct.deleteCategoryProduct */ UPDATE T_PRD_CTG SET PRD_CTG_USE_YN = 'N', PRD_CTG_DSP_YN = 'N', PRD_CTG_DEL_YN = 'Y', PRD_CTG_UPD_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), PRD_CTG_UPD_IP = #{PRD_CTG_UPD_IP}, PRD_CTG_UPD_ID = #{PRD_CTG_UPD_ID} WHERE (PRD_CTG_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX} OR PRD_CTG_UP_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX} OR PRD_CTG_TOP_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX})
mapper.select: /* CategoryProduct.selectSpecCategoryList */ SELECT TA.DSP_SPC_IDX , TA.DSP_PRD_CTG_IDX , TA.DSP_PRD_SPC_IDX , TA.DSP_PRD_DEL_YN , ( SELECT SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(SPC_MST_NM, '>'),2) AS PRD_CTG_LVL_NM FROM T_SPC_MST A WHERE SPC_MST_DEL_YN != 'Y' AND SPC_MST_IDX = TA.DSP_PRD_SPC_IDX START WITH A.SPC_MST_UP_IDX = -1 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.SPC_MST_IDX = A.SPC_MST_UP_IDX ) AS PRD_CTG_LVL_NM FROM T_DSP_SPC TA WHERE TA.DSP_PRD_CTG_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX} AND TA.DSP_PRD_DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: /* CategoryProduct.deleteCategorySpec */ UPDATE T_DSP_SPC SET DSP_SPC_DEL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), DSP_SPC_DEL_IP = #{PRD_CTG_UPD_IP}, DSP_SPC_DEL_ID = #{PRD_CTG_UPD_ID}, DSP_PRD_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE DSP_SPC_IDX = #{DSP_SPC_IDX}
mapper.select: /* CategoryProduct.selectCategorySpecCount */ SELECT NVL(COUNT(DSP_SPC_IDX),0) FROM T_DSP_SPC WHERE DSP_PRD_CTG_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX} AND DSP_PRD_SPC_IDX = #{DSP_PRD_SPC_IDX} AND DSP_PRD_DEL_YN != 'Y'
mapper.update: /* CategoryProduct.deleteCategorySpec */ UPDATE T_DSP_SPC SET DSP_SPC_DEL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), DSP_SPC_DEL_IP = #{PRD_CTG_UPD_IP}, DSP_SPC_DEL_ID = #{PRD_CTG_UPD_ID}, DSP_PRD_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE DSP_PRD_CTG_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX}
mapper.select: /* CategoryProduct.selectCategoryChlidCount */ SELECT NVL(COUNT(PRD_CTG_IDX),0) FROM T_PRD_CTG WHERE PRD_CTG_UP_IDX = #{PRD_CTG_IDX}
